#summary timeSelect(objectName, property [order, separator])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing three (3) select form controls based on the supplied property and objectName. Wheels will generate the appropriate name convention for the form control.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The name of the object (model name) to wrap the property around ||
|| * property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to use in the form control ||
|| * order* || string || false || hour,minute,second || A list specifying in which order to include (or exclude) the `hour`, `minute` and `second` select controls ||
|| * separator* || string || false || : || Text to include between the three (3) select form controls ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p><label>Open until</label> <br />
          #timeSelect(objectName='business', property='openUntil')#</p>	
</cfoutput>
}}}
